video_identification.title: Anton Goodman from Rabbis for Human Rights discusses Planting Justice on Radio Kan (English)

extracted_metadata.title: Anton Goodman from Rabbis for Human Rights discusses Planting Justice on Radio Kan (English)
extracted_metadata.description: Planting trees for justice with Rabbis for Human Rights! From December 27th to March 7th, we will go out every Friday to plant trees with Palestinian communities in the occupied territories and the Negev. After the extensive damage the communities suffered during the war, we will come to support, strengthen and plant trees. To donate a tree: tree-rhr.org
